title: Many Kinds of Dinosaurs
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 50 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 120L
description: Many Kinds of Dinosaurs introduces students to the numerous ways dinosaurs differ from one another. Detailed illustrations and simple sentences support early emergent readers. Students will have the opportunity to compare and contrast as well as to make visualizations.
reviewWords: dinosaur, head, kind, leg, live, teeth
comprehension: Compare and Contrast                : Compare and contrast
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant sound /l/
grammar: Plural Nouns                : Recognize and use plural nouns
